item.title: JOdin and Heimdal on MacOsX
item.description: Home Installation on Mac You know that feeling ,when you tinker with your phone , root it ,install new roms and try out new recovery methods. and then the moment of truth …you restart the phone and its stuck at the dreaded Downloading …Do not turn off target!! You try the usual key combinations VOLUME DOWN + HOME + POWER. All at the same time ,wait for a few seconds and ….
